original_text:
Gold Hit: O’Reilly’s Riches
Il popolare folletto verde irlandese nasconde sempre dei grandi tesori. E nella slot Gold Hit O’Reilly’s Riches hai la possibilità di vincerli, incluso il jackpot. In questa recensione, controlleremo la vincita massima, la volatilità, la tabella dei pagamenti e l’RTP, alla fortuna pensaci tu!
Gold Hit: O’Reilly’s Riches: gameplay, RTP e volatilità 
In Gold Hit O’Reilly’s Riches, non avrai il classico gameplay. Il gioco ha 5 rulli come di consueto è vero, ma il 1° e il 2° hanno 4 file, 3° e  il 4° ne hanno 6 e il 5° rullo ne ha 8. Per quanto concerne il payout, questo gioco ha 4.608 linee di vincita. 
Per ottenere una vincita sono necessari da 3 a 6 simboli sui rulli adiacenti. Puoi girarli puntando un minimo di 0,1€ fino ad un massimo di 350€. Se ti piace l’opzione di rotazione automatica, tieni premuto il pulsante Autoplay per attivarla.
Tema e design: tutto il folklore irlandese in una sola slot  
Gold Hit O’Reilly’s Riches è una slot dal popolare stile irlandese con il Leprechaun portafortuna. Sullo sfondo, si stende la classica campagna verdeggiante intervallata da colline. Al centro,incastonati in una corteccia d’albero, appare la griglia con i rulli, che girano a ritmo di una simpatica musichetta.
Simboli e payout 
Le carte, il ferro di cavallo e la pipa pagano da 0,4x a 2x la scommessa, mentre la pecora con gli occhiali da sole e la coccinella garantiscono da 0,4 a 3 volte la puntata. Il simbolo più prezioso è il Leprechauns con 1x, 2x e 5x la scommessa. 
Per raggiungere la vincita massima, devi essere molto fortunato a vincere i jackpot. Esatto, hai bisogno di almeno 5 Mega jackpot per ottenere 2.500 volte la scommessa e non è proprio facilissimo! Vincere anche solo un Mega jackpot con 500 volte la puntata sarebbe già un grande risultato.
Con simboli speciali in Gold Hit O’Reilly’s Riches, puoi attivare varie funzionalità:
Icona Wild: quando il Wild cade, sostituisce i simboli mancanti per le combinazioni vincenti ad eccezione di altre icone speciali;
Icona Bonus: attiva il gioco bonus con 3 e più icone Bonus
Icona Moneta: esce sui rulli con un valore da 1x a 10x della puntata. I simboli delle monete si bloccano anche su un punto per 3 giri durante il gioco base.
Per quanto concerne il payout, Gold Hit O’Reilly’s Riches presenta un’elevata volatilità per ottenere ricompense consistenti anche se meno frequenti e un RTP del 95,21% che ti consente una possibilità teorica di riconquistare la quota della scommessa.
Funzionalità speciali e bonus presenti nel gameplay

Funzione Giri Gratuiti – In Gold Hit O’Reilly’s Riches, i giocatori possono attivare un gioco bonus. Per 3, 4 e 5 simboli Bonus ottieni 10, 12 e 15 giri gratis. Ciò consente di segnare più vittorie con la stessa puntata. Durante questa funzione, i simboli Monete non scompaiono dai rulli finché non ottieni una vittoria. Inoltre, sopra i rulli compare una ruota con vari bonus. Può atterrare su moltiplicatori fino a 10x, il che aumenterà il valore dei simboli Monete;



Funzione Gold Hit – Durante il gioco base e i giri gratuiti, puoi ottenere simboli Monete. Nel frattempo, puoi ottenere una moneta Shamrock che attiva i seguenti premi jackpot:



Mini – 20x la puntata, 
Minor – 50x la puntata;
Major – 100x la puntata;
Mega – 500x la puntata.

Se sei iper fortunato, puoi ottenere più monete Shamrock contemporaneamente e ricevere subito le loro preziose ricompense. 
Valutazione conclusive e verdetto
Gold Hit O’Reilly’s Riches è un meraviglioso gioco di Playtech. Il layout grafico è ben realizzato anche se molto semplice, forse qualche dettaglio di animazione in più non avrebbe guastato, oppure è voluto dallo sviluppatore, proprio per focalizzare l’attenzione del giocatore sui giri di rulli e sui simboli delle Monete.  
A livello di funzionalità, ci disturba un po’ non poter riattivare i giri gratis, una mancanza che viene comunque colmata dalla possibilità di vincere jackpot durante il gioco base. Puoi giocarci in qualsiasi momento senza registrazione. Ciò ti consente di testare al meglio la slot di Playtech e prepararti per passare in seguito a round con deposito.

Domande Frequenti 
La slot Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches è disponibile sui dispositivi mobili?

È compatibile con tutti i dispositivi conosciuti, inclusi PC, tablet e smartphone che funzionano con Windows, macOS, iOS o Android. 



Dove posso giocare alla slot Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches con soldi veri?

Dai un'occhiata alla migliore lista di casinò per questa slot che abbiamo preparato per te e non dimenticare di richiedere un bonus di benvenuto per iniziare la tua sessione con un vantaggio immediato in più.



Ci sono altre slot a tema Leprechaun su Slotjava?

Certo, questo tema è molto popolare tra i nostri utenti. Le nostre 3 slot gratis preferite sono: Leprechaun Goes Wild (Play’ n Go); Rainbow Riches Leprechaun Gold (Barcrest) e Leprechaun's Luck Cash Collect sempre di Playtech.

raw_translation.response:
Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches

The popular Irish green elf always hides great treasures. And in the Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches slot, you have the chance to win them, including the jackpot. In this review, we will check the maximum win, volatility, paytable, and RTP – leave the luck to you!

Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches: gameplay, RTP, and volatility
In Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches, you won't have the classic gameplay. The game has 5 reels as usual, but the 1st and 2nd have 4 rows, the 3rd and 4th have 6, and the 5th reel has 8. Regarding the payout, this game has 4,608 paylines.
To win, you need 3 to 6 symbols on adjacent reels. You can spin them with a minimum of €0.1 and a maximum of €350. If you like the autoplay option, hold down the Autoplay button to activate it.

Theme and design: all Irish folklore in one slot
Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches is an Irish-styled slot with the lucky Leprechaun. In the background, you have the classic green countryside interspersed with hills. In the center, set in a tree bark, you have the grid with the reels, spinning to the rhythm of a nice little tune.

Symbols and payout
Cards, horseshoe, and pipe pay from 0.4x to 2x the bet, while the sheep with sunglasses and the ladybug guarantee from 0.4 to 3 times the bet. The most valuable symbol is the Leprechaun with 1x, 2x, and 5x the bet. To reach the maximum win, you need to be very lucky to win the jackpots. That's right – you need at least 5 Mega jackpots to get 2,500 times the bet, and it's not easy! Winning even a Mega jackpot with 500 times the bet would already be a great result.
With special symbols in Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches, you can activate various features:

Wild symbol: when the Wild falls, it replaces the missing symbols for winning combinations except other special icons;

Bonus symbol: activates the bonus game with 3 or more Bonus icons;

Coin symbol: appears on the reels with a value from 1x to 10x the bet. The coin symbols also lock on one point for 3 spins during the base game.

Regarding the payout, Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches presents high volatility to obtain consistent rewards, even if less frequent, and an RTP of 95.21%, allowing you a theoretical chance of recovering the bet's quota.

Special features and bonuses in gameplay

Free Spins feature - In Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches, players can activate a bonus game. With 3, 4, and 5 Bonus symbols, you get 10, 12, and 15 free spins. This allows you to score more wins with the same bet. During this feature, Coin symbols do not disappear from the reels until you get a win. Also, above the reels appears a wheel with various bonuses. It can land on multipliers up to 10x, which will increase the value of the Coin symbols;

Gold Hit feature - During the base game and free spins, you can get Coin symbols. Meanwhile, you can get a shamrock coin that activates the following jackpot prizes:

Mini - 20x the bet;

Minor - 50x the bet;

Major - 100x the bet;

Mega - 500x the bet.

If you're hyper lucky, you can get multiple shamrock coins simultaneously and receive their precious rewards immediately.

Final evaluation and verdict
Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches is a wonderful Playtech game. The graphic layout is well-made, although very simple – perhaps a few more animation details wouldn't have hurt, or it's wanted by the developer to focus the player's attention on the reel spins and Coin symbols.

Concerning functionality, we are a bit bothered not to be able to reactivate free spins, a lack that is still filled by the possibility of winning jackpots during the base game. You can play it anytime without registration. This allows you to test Playtech's slot better and prepare to move on to deposit rounds later.

FAQ
Is the Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches slot available on mobile devices?
It is compatible with all known devices, including PCs, tablets, and smartphones running on Windows, macOS, iOS, or Android.

Where can I play the Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches slot with real money?
Check out the best list of casinos for this slot we have prepared for you and don't forget to request a welcome bonus to start your session with an immediate advantage.

Are there any other Leprechaun-themed slots on Slotjava?
Certainly, this theme is very popular among our users. Our 3 favorite free slots are: Leprechaun Goes Wild (Play'n Go); Rainbow Riches Leprechaun Gold (Barcrest), and Leprechaun's Luck Cash Collect also by Playtech.

Gold Hit: O’Reilly’s Riches Gameplay, RTP, and Volatility

Gold Hit: O’Reilly’s Riches doesn't have the classic gameplay style, as the game has 5 reels, but the 1st and 2nd reels have 4 rows, the 3rd and 4th have 6, while the 5th reel has 8. Review: Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches

The popular Irish green elf always hides great treasures. And in the Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches slot, you have the chance to win them, including the jackpot. In this review, we will check the maximum win, volatility, paytable, and RTP – leave the luck to you!

Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches: gameplay, RTP, and volatility
In Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches, you won't have the classic gameplay. The game has 5 reels as usual, but the 1st and 2nd have 4 rows, the 3rd and 4th have 6, and the 5th reel has 8. Regarding the payout, this game has 4,608 paylines.
To win, you need 3 to 6 symbols on adjacent reels. You can spin them with a minimum of €0.1 and a maximum of €350. If you like the autoplay option, hold down the Autoplay button to activate it.

Theme and design: all Irish folklore in one slot
Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches is an Irish-styled slot with the lucky Leprechaun. In the background, you have the classic green countryside interspersed with hills. In the center, set in a tree bark, you have the grid with the reels, spinning to the rhythm of a nice little tune.

Symbols and payout
Cards, horseshoe, and pipe pay from 0.4x to 2x the bet, while the sheep with sunglasses and the ladybug guarantee from 0.4 to 3 times the bet. The most valuable symbol is the Leprechaun with 1x, 2x, and 5x the bet. To reach the maximum win, you need to be very lucky to win the jackpots. That's right – you need at least 5 Mega jackpots to get 2,500 times the bet, and it's not easy! Winning even a Mega jackpot with 500 times the bet would already be a great result.
With special symbols in Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches, you can activate various features:

Wild symbol: when the Wild falls, it replaces the missing symbols for winning combinations except other special icons;

Bonus symbol: activates the bonus game with 3 or more Bonus icons;

Coin symbol: appears on the reels with a value from 1x to 10x the bet. The coin symbols also lock on one point for 3 spins during the base game.

Regarding the payout, Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches presents high volatility to obtain consistent rewards, even if less frequent, and an RTP of 95.21%, allowing you a theoretical chance of recovering the bet's quota.

Special features and bonuses in gameplay

Free Spins feature - In Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches, players can activate a bonus game. With 3, 4, and 5 Bonus symbols, you get 10, 12, and 15 free spins. This allows you to score more wins with the same bet. During this feature, Coin symbols do not disappear from the reels until you get a win. Also, above the reels appears a wheel with various bonuses. It can land on multipliers up to 10x, which will increase the value of the Coin symbols;

Gold Hit feature - During the base game and free spins, you can get Coin symbols. Meanwhile, you can get a shamrock coin that activates the following jackpot prizes:

Mini - 20x the bet;

Minor - 50x the bet;

Major - 100x the bet;

Mega - 500x the bet.

If you're hyper lucky, you can get multiple shamrock coins simultaneously and receive their precious rewards immediately.

Final evaluation and verdict
Gold Hit: O'Reilly's Riches is a wonderful Playtech game. The graphic layout is well-made, although very simple – perhaps a few more animation details wouldn't have hurt, or it's wanted by the developer to focus the player's attention on the reel spins and Coin symbols.

Concerning functionality, we are a bit bothered not to be able to reactivate free spins, a lack that is still filled by the possibility of winning jackpots during the base game. You can play it anytime without registration. This allows you to test Playtech's slot better and prepare to move on to deposit rounds later.
